stripped_doc: Returns whether Hermes is currently open. Most other functions in Hermes.spoon will automatically start the application, so this function can be used to guard against that.
Function.desc: Returns whether Hermes is currently open. Most other functions in Hermes.spoon will automatically start the application, so this function can be used to guard against that.
Function.doc:
Returns whether Hermes is currently open. Most other functions in Hermes.spoon will automatically start the application, so this function can be used to guard against that.

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A boolean value indicating whether the Hermes application is running.
returns: * A boolean value indicating whether the Hermes application is running.
Function.name: isRunning

stripped_doc: Returns whether Hermes is currently playing
Function.desc: Returns whether Hermes is currently playing
Function.doc:
Returns whether Hermes is currently playing

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A boolean value indicating whether Hermes is currently playing a track, or nil if an error occurred (unknown player state). Also returns false if the application is not running
returns: * A boolean value indicating whether Hermes is currently playing a track, or nil if an error occurred (unknown player state). Also returns false if the application is not running
Function.name: isPlaying
